description: After two days of legal argument, judges must now rule on whether Israel is committing genocide in Gaza.
maintext: Genocide is notoriously difficult to prove. There needs to be compelling evidence of intent by those actually in charge of Israel's military campaign in Gaza, as well as a pattern of behaviour by the Israel Defense Forces that cannot reasonably be explained as anything other than genocidal.
title: South Africa's genocide case against Israel: Both sides play heavy on emotion in ICJ hearing
